humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, sentinel lymph nodes 1 and 2 from the right axilla were biopsied and no tumor was found in either of them (0/1 and 0/2). Additionally, cytokeratin AE1/3 stains were performed and were negative. Based on the new rule 11, N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node. Lymph node status: Negative 0/3.' This indicates that there was no tumor found in the sentinel lymph nodes (0/3), which corresponds to an N0 stage.
